/apps/GCC/6.4.0/bin/g++   CMakeFiles/gather.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/gather.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o gather /usr/local/cuda-9.1/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.so  -L"/usr/local/cuda-9.1/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-9.1/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
